description:
Part A:
Naoki Junichi was in love with a woman he’d always see at the train station platform. Moguro notices this and tells him that he’ll bring the two together. Despite having some suspicions about Moguro, Naoki’s feelings for the woman only grow stronger...
Part B:
Michihara Kakeru had been running to relieve stress from his job. However, there have been a lot more runners lately and it was getting a bit crowded, which was causing him even more stress. Moguro notices this and hands Michihara a...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La fille sur le quai – Le Paradis des coureurs
The Woman on the Platform / Runners` Paradise
プラットホームの女 / 走行者天国
